data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bayarsaikhan, Ulziijargal, Bae, Yang ˗ Seop (2019): Four new and one newly recorded species of Diduga Moore, [1887] (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae) from Vietnam, with redescription of the little known species Diduga haematomiformis van Eecke, 1920. Zootaxa 4624 (3): 365-376, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4624.3.5|25 occurrences
